info.name: Technician Work Orders API
info.description: Complete API collection for Technician Work Orders app

item.name: Work Orders

request.description:
Retrieves all work orders from the data store.

**Returns:**
- Status 200: Array of work orders
- Status 500: Server error

Creates a new work order.

**Required Fields:**
- title: string (2-80 characters)
- description: string (10-500 characters)
- priority: 'Low' | 'Medium' | 'High'
- status: 'Open' | 'In Progress' | 'Done'

**Returns:**
- Status 201: Created work order with auto-generated ID and timestamp
- Status 400: Validation error
- Status 500: Server error

Retrieves a single work order by its UUID.

**Parameters:**
- id: UUID string (required in URL path)

**Returns:**
- Status 200: Work order object
- Status 400: Invalid UUID format
- Status 404: Work order not found
- Status 500: Server error

Updates an existing work order. All fields are optional for partial updates.

**Parameters:**
- id: UUID string (required in URL path)

**Optional Fields in Body:**
- title: string (2-80 characters)
- description: string (10-500 characters)
- priority: 'Low' | 'Medium' | 'High'
- status: 'Open' | 'In Progress' | 'Done'

**Returns:**
- Status 200: Updated work order
- Status 400: Validation error or invalid UUID
- Status 404: Work order not found
- Status 500: Server error

Deletes a work order by its UUID.

**Parameters:**
- id: UUID string (required in URL path)

**Returns:**
- Status 200: Success message
- Status 400: Invalid UUID format
- Status 404: Work order not found
- Status 500: Server error
